name: backend
description: Firebase backend system with Cloud Functions for storing and retrieving JSON documents

scripts.deploy:prod: cd .. && npm run build && cd firebase && ts-node scripts/switch-instance.ts prod && firebase deploy && rm functions/.env
scripts.deploy:functions: ts-node scripts/switch-instance.ts prod && firebase deploy --only functions && rm functions/.env
scripts.deploy:hosting: cd .. && npm run build && cd firebase && firebase deploy --only hosting
